test.name: TC14: Validar filtro Sort By Price Lowest First

kw.name: Abrir navegador
kw.doc: Abri o browser com a página em branco

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: que estou na tela Home
kw.doc: Direciona para a tela Home e confirma o nome da página

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: seleciono a opção Dresses - Summer Dresses
kw.doc: move o mouse até a opção Dresses sem clicar apresentando as opções que posso clicar, ... e clico na opção Summer Dresses

kw.name: passo o cursor sobre a opção Dresses
kw.doc: move o mouse até a opção Dresses sem clicar apresentando as opções que posso clicar

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'css=#block_top_menu > ul > li:nth-child(2) > a'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
